actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that certain elderly individuals will not be required to make payments of estimated tax.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that taxpayers age 65 and older with unearned income less than $25,000 will not be required to make a declaration or payment of estimated tax.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that certain elderly individuals will not be required to make payments of estimated tax.
